product_name: Chuckit! Kick Fetch Dog Toy - Small
long_description: The small Chuckit! Kick Fetch dog toy gives your tired arms a rest at the dog park. Give the toy a solid kick to send it flying and your pup charging after it. Made of a durable blend of polyester, foam and rubber that will stand up to regular play. Chuckit! Kick Fetch dog toy is designed for ground pursuit.
short_description: The small Chuckit! Kick Fetch dog toy gives your tired arms a rest at the dog park. Give the toy a solid kick to send it flying and your pup charging after it.
